{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT54GX2 |revision=v1 |upc=745883566570 |asin=B000AXU76E |newegg=N82E16833124050 |fcc_date=08/09/2005 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=RT3105W |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT54GX2,SA3-AGN0922AR0100 |ic_id=3839A-WRT54GX2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8651B |cpu1_cspeed=200 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV160ABTC-90G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S641632H-TC75 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Airgo AGN0922AR-01 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip1_model=AGN102BB |wi1_chip2_brand=Airgo |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=linksys |default_ssid_regex=^linksys$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:13:10,00:16:B6 |oui_eth=00:18:39,00:18:F8 }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Broadband Router with SRX200}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT54GX2}}
WRT54GX2 v1.0 serial numbers appear to start with '''KKJ0'''. <!--{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRT54GX2_v1}}--> *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=25270 ''Linksys WRT54GX2'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] (PCB images) :OEM: [[Askey]] RT3105W (28-000311, REV1.1, 02/18/2005) :Processor: [[Realtek]] RTL8651B :Flash: MX29LV160ABTC-90G (NAND) :RAM: ''Samsung'' K4S641632H-TC75 (2x) :Wireless: [[Airgo]] AGN102BB-01 :OUI: 00:16:B6 (Wi-Fi), 00:18:F8 (ETH)
